Posts.Content: had mastectomy monday and all lymph nodes out which i v been told all look suspect, so feeling sore and really low, i think its hit me like a sledge hammer that this is going to be a long haul. iv got to go back on the 19th for the results of the lymph nodes, which iv got the feeling isnt going to be good, feeling lonely no one to talk to that knows what im going throughx
Posts.Title: out of hospital today and really feeling low
out of hospital today and really feeling low

Posts.Content: thank you for replying it seems every appointment iv had its always more bad news, as first i was told it was DCIS and very treatable, then after i had the lumpectamy it turned out to be grade 3 aggresive cancer, and now with the lymph nodes not looking good i think iv gone into shock. i think i do need to talk to other people that are or have gone through this that understands the emotions.
Posts.Title: out of hospital today and really feeling low
